entries.noble_1: You're not?  Oh, well, I mean of course you're not.  I knew that.  I could tell just by looking at you.  You have that heroic sort of aura about you.  Indeed you do.
entries.reply_1: I'm not a pirate.  I'm here to rescue you.
entries.start: Ach!  Another wretched pirate.  You'll never get away with this!  You filthy disease-ridden scum will pay!  Pay dearly!  I have friends in powerful places!  Poweful friends in powerful places!  That's right!  Poweful!  They know how to deal with the likes of you!
